description: Complete home cleaning for a 3-bedroom house. Deep cleaned carpets, kitchen appliances, and bathroom fixtures.
Move-out cleaning for a luxury apartment. Restored all surfaces to pristine condition, leading to full security deposit return for the client.
Kitchen deep cleaning service. Degreased and sanitized all surfaces, cleaned inside cabinets, and restored appliances to like-new condition.
Modern bob haircut with subtle balayage highlights. Created a stylish yet low-maintenance look for a client with an active lifestyle.
Bridal makeup and hairstyling for a summer wedding. Created a natural yet elegant look that lasted throughout the ceremony and reception.
Gel manicure with custom nail art. Created a unique design tailored to the client's personal style for a special event.
iPhone screen replacement and data recovery for a client who dropped their phone in water. Saved all personal photos and contacts.
Gaming PC build and optimization. Assembled a high-performance custom system for a professional gamer with specific cooling and lighting requirements.
Business network setup for a small marketing firm. Installed and configured secure Wi-Fi, file sharing, and backup systems for a team of 15 employees.
